name: Christine Betts
title: Computer Science Student

work.description: Designs and implements front-end code for a lab-on-a-chip project under the PLSE and MISL labs.
Taught Java basics in second in intro programming series in twice-weekly section to ~20 students. Graded weekly assignments & exams, plans lessons, and dove in-depth at tutoring lab.

Communicated with cross-office team to expand the AdWords Scripts API, a service advertisers use to automate search ad creation/reporting. Uses server-side knowledge, Java & Javascript, and good documentation to create a well-designed and maintainable implementation of the designed API expansion.
Researched policies and crafted arguments with an emphasis on development, education, and the environment. Gave capitol tours and communicated with constituents.
Worked across roles in startup catering company including managing HR functions, creating efficiency-doubling Excel models, planning non-profit events, designing promotional materials.

education.description: Involved in larger UW community as a Unite UW facilitator (an organization celebrating cross-cultural connections) and member of the provost’s advisory committee.
Top 1% of class, NHS president, newspaper editor, Kindness Council founder, principal oboist, cross-country runner.

awards: Allen Institute for Artificial Intelligence: Outstanding Software Engineer
UW Dean’s List Au ‘16, Wi '17, Wi '18
Missouri State Women in Legislature Scholarship
strengths: Strong communicator, especially as a teacher
